Comments_List: I gained knowledge of formal Arabic vocabulary and grammar, as well as some cultural knowledge.

This semester pushed me a lot in my Arabic skills - the shift from Beginner to Intermediate marks a different pace and content for language courses, and one I personally enjoy a lot. The topics we worked on and the vocabulary I acquired were interesting and useful.

This course has a lot of individual attention from the professor, which aids learning. Direct feedback in class is very helpful. Sarab is extremely receptive to student questions, and she is patient when explaining topics. The weakness of the course is that you are required to complete daily homework assignments, but you receive no feedback on them.
I would recommend this course. You learn a lot, without an unbearably heavy workload.
Yes; I would recommend any course with Sarab, she's an excellent teacher.
